SEARCH
Package units

Class Spawner

java.lang.Object
units.Spawner
public final class Spawner extends Object
The object Spawner schedules the creation of new enemies and gives them to the game engine at the right time.

    • Spawner

      public Spawner(Level parent)
      Constructor for Spawner
      Parameters:
      parent - the level to submit enemies to

  • Method Details

    • setWave

      public boolean setWave(String newWaveName)
      Loads wave from assets. This method needs to be called before using the spawner unless you want an UninitializedSpawner exception kicking in
      Parameters:
      newWaveName - the wave to load
      Returns:
      whether the wave is properly loaded or not

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Point2D.Float newPosition)
      Setter for spawner's position
      Parameters:
      newPosition - the new position to spawn units on

    • getWaveName

      public String getWaveName() throws UninitializedSpawner
      Getter for current wave name
      Returns:
      the current wave name
      Throws:
      UninitializedSpawner - if no wave is loaded

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Is the spawner spawning ?
      Returns:
      whether the spawner is spawning units or not

    • spawnNext

      public void spawnNext()
      Spawns the next enemy then starts the timer for next

    • start

      public void start() throws UninitializedSpawner
      Starts the spawner schedule
      Throws:
      UninitializedSpawner - if the spawner does not hold a wave
